Effective June 29, 2020, gatherings of fifty (50) or fewer people are permitted at a place of business. Please review the Healthy at Work guidance document for a complete list of the requirements and processes for all in-person Erlanger-Elsmere Schools meetings. This includes our meetings of the Board of Education. Thank you.

As of right now all school districts will be using NTI days combined with spring breaks (non NTI Days) through April 17, 2020. This puts the anticipated return date as April 20th for KY students.
